sentences.en: May I decant it now to allow it to breathe?
sentences.cn: 我可否慢慢倒,好让香味散发出来?

sentences.en: Vintage ports must be decanted to remove natural sediments.
sentences.cn: 优质的葡萄酒必须倒出以清除其中自然沉淀的杂质。

sentences.en: You centrifuge the solution, decant the supernatant, and discard the pellet.
sentences.cn: 你然后对溶液离心, 慢慢倒出上清,弃沉淀.对上清液你加更多的硫酸铵.

words.tran_cn: 玻璃水瓶；滗析器；倾注洗涤器

trans.tran_en: If you decant a liquid into another container, you put it into another container

trans.tran_cn: 将（酒等）自瓶中倒入另一容器
